mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, enabled, role_code, name, tel, email, createtime) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{enabled}, #{role_code}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{createtime});
mapper.select:
SELECT u.id, u.username, u.password, u.enabled, r.role, u.name, u.tel, u.email
FROM user u
JOIN u_roles r ON u.role_code = r.id
WHERE u.username = #{username};
